name: octowise
description: An application for syncing Kindle highlights between various sources
author: Marcus Crane <marcus@utf9k.net>

scripts.pack: yarn run build && yarn run rebuild && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder -c ./electron-builder.js --win --linux
scripts.pack:all: yarn run build && yarn run rebuild && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder -c ./electron-builder.js --win --linux --mac
scripts.pack:win: yarn run build && yarn run rebuild && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder -c ./electron-builder.js --win
scripts.pack:mac: yarn run build && yarn run rebuild && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder -c ./electron-builder.js --mac
scripts.pack:linux: yarn run build && yarn run rebuild && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder -c ./electron-builder.js --linux

simple-git-hooks.pre-commit: yarn run prettier && yarn run lint-staged
